override.description: Whether CloudFront overrides the `Referrer-Policy` HTTP response header received from the origin with the one specified in this response headers policy.

referrerPolicy.description: The value of the `Referrer-Policy` HTTP response header. Valid Values: `no-referrer` | `no-referrer-when-downgrade` | `origin` | `origin-when-cross-origin` | `same-origin` | `strict-origin` | `strict-origin-when-cross-origin` | `unsafe-url`
